translation.en: [Richards] Life's a funny thing, you know.
translation.zh: 人生很有意思

translation.en: But I've always thought 30 was about it.
translation.zh: 可我一直认为这就到30岁

translation.en: Beyond that would be horrible to be alive.
translation.zh: 之后的人生会很可怕

translation.en: Until I got to be 31.
translation.zh: 直到我快31岁

translation.en: Then, "Why, I ain't so shabby," you know. [laughs]
translation.zh: 然后我想：“为什么 我没那么寒酸

translation.en: "I'll hang in a while."
translation.zh: 我要继续活一段时间”

translation.en: As you go along, you realize that this whole concept of growing up is...
translation.zh: 随着逐渐长大 你意识到成长的定义就是…

translation.en: You're not grown up until the day they put you six feet under.
translation.zh: 直到入土那天 你都长不大

translation.en: You're never grown up.
translation.zh: 你永远长不大

translation.en: ♪ I'm blue and lonesome ♪
translation.zh: 小沃尔特 HATE TO SEE YOU GO

translation.en: You don't get bluer than that.
translation.zh: 没有比这再好的蓝调音乐了

translation.en: Man, that's bad stuff.
translation.zh: 好曲子

translation.en: [Richards] The power of the blues was a mind blower.
translation.zh: 蓝调的力量动人心弦

translation.en: Anybody who could make a sound like that is all right with me.
translation.zh: 能写出这种曲子的人我都喜欢

translation.en: [chuckles] You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 你明白我的意思吗？

translation.en: For me, music is like the center of everything.
translation.zh: 对我而言 音乐就像一切的中心

translation.en: It's something that binds people together through centuries, through millennium.
translation.zh: 几个世纪 一千年以来 它把人类凝结在一起

translation.en: It's undefinable.
translation.zh: 没办法去定义它

translation.en: And nobody's ever going to have the answer to it,
translation.zh: 也没有人能解答

translation.en: but it's great fun exploring.
translation.zh: 但探索起来很有趣

translation.en: -Anthony, how are you? -How are you?
translation.zh: -安东尼 你好吗？ -你好吗？

translation.en: -[Richards] Cool, man. -Once again.
translation.zh: -很好 兄弟 -再来

translation.en: Once more into the breach.
translation.zh: 再战江湖

translation.en: [Richards] How you been, Anthony?
translation.zh: 你怎么样 安东尼？

translation.en: -I'm very well, thank you. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 很好 谢谢 记者-安东尼科蒂斯

translation.en: So, Keith, I've been enjoying your new music.
translation.zh: 基思 我一直在欣赏你的新曲

translation.en: Why don't you tell me a little bit about getting it going?
translation.zh: 何不给我讲讲你的动机？

translation.en: You know, what made you decide to jump back in?
translation.zh: 你为什么决定回来做音乐？

translation.en: I've been thinking about that.
translation.zh: 我一直在思考

translation.en: You know, I think it coincided with the fact that I was doing the book, you know...
translation.zh: 很巧 我那时正在写书…

translation.en: -Second only to the Bible. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 销量仅次于《圣经》

translation.en: And The Stones had one of their...
translation.zh: 滚石乐队那时…

translation.en: where they suddenly go into hibernation for about five years.
translation.zh: 突然隐退了五年

translation.en: 'Cause we... The Stones had been working a lot until about 2007.
translation.zh: 因为在大约2007年以前 我们一直有大量工作要忙

translation.en: And I was kind of itching to get back in the studio.
translation.zh: 我有点想回录音棚

translation.en: I love recording, you see.
translation.zh: 我喜爱录音 你知道

translation.en: Any studio, I feel totally at home there.
translation.zh: 在录音棚的感觉 跟在家一模一样

translation.en: Everywhere else, you know, is, you know... there's the bags.
translation.zh: 别的地方…有很多包袱

translation.en: [Steve Jordan] Should we get another mic in there?
translation.zh: 要再放一个麦克风进去吗？

translation.en: -Or should we just move the ribbon closer? -[Richards] No, listen...
translation.zh: -还是把吉他靠近点？ -不用 听…

translation.en: Play a couple things.
translation.zh: 弹几个音

translation.en: That's better, right?
translation.zh: 好多了 是吧？

translation.en: [Richards] And the next thing I know, Steve Jordan came to me, and he said,
translation.zh: 后来史蒂夫乔丹找我 他说

translation.en: "How about just the two of us go in the studio,
translation.zh: “就咱俩进棚录个音怎么样

translation.en: you know, just you and me, and we'll cut a couple of tracks?
translation.zh: 就咱俩 录几首曲子？

translation.en: Just, you know, see what happens."
translation.zh: 看看效果如何”

translation.en: [Jordan] He said something and it was kind of shocking.
translation.zh: 他说了些话 让人挺震惊的

translation.en: And I asked him never to say that again.
translation.zh: 这种话我让他别再说了

translation.en: He said, "Well, you know, I've done all of this... and now the book and everything."
translation.zh: 他说：“我都做过… 现在在写书”

translation.en: He hadn't been playing.
translation.zh: 他一直没有演出

translation.en: And he was like, "You know, maybe I should, like, retire," kinda thing.
translation.zh: 制作人-史蒂夫乔丹 他觉得：“也许我该退休了”

translation.en: -Yeah. -At which I completely freaked out.
translation.zh: 把我给吓坏了

translation.en: [laughing] I said, "What are you talking about?"
translation.zh: 我说：“你说什么呢？”

translation.en: I was talking in my sleep.
translation.zh: 我说梦话呢

translation.en: I said, "What are you talking about?"
translation.zh: 我说：“你说什么呢？”

translation.en: [man 1] Can you get it? Yeah. [man 2] Yep.
translation.zh: 行吗？

translation.en: [man 1] Yeah, it's a little boomy. [man 2] Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 低音有点强

translation.en: [Tom Waits] Musically, what I noticed about Keith, is he's really big on detail.
translation.zh: 在音乐上 我发现 基思是个无敌的细节控

translation.en: And you have to be if you're...
translation.zh: 你必须如此…

translation.en: an archeologist and you're, you know... You insist on locality data, you know.
translation.zh: 如果你是个考古学家 就要坚决主张地理数据

translation.en: Not only where something came from,
translation.zh: 不只是在乎东西是从哪来的

translation.en: but what are the principles and the properties of it.
translation.zh: 还要在乎它的原则 性质

translation.en: And he... He's like a... like a London cabbie who has The Knowledge.
translation.zh: 他就像过了理论考试的 伦敦出租车司机

translation.en: -[man] Yeah, yeah. -Only he has that in music, you know.
translation.zh: -对 -只有他的音乐里有那个

translation.en: [Richards] I realized, as I was doing this stuff,
translation.zh: 我做这件事的时候意识到

translation.en: how much steeped I am in American folk music,
translation.zh: 我对美国民谣 爵士 蓝调

translation.en: in jazz and blues.
translation.zh: 有多么无法自拔

translation.en: That's the stuff that America has given the rest of the world.
translation.zh: 那是美国给其他国家的东西

translation.en: You know, far bigger than H-bombs. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 比氢弹的影响大多了

translation.en: [Richards] Crosseyed Heart, I'm doing a lot of the tipping of the hat to people.
translation.zh: Crosseyed Heart里 有很多向大家致敬的地方

translation.en: And this was to Robert Johnson.
translation.zh: 这首是向罗伯特约翰逊致敬

translation.en: [Richards] I grew up listening basically to American music,
translation.zh: 虽然我在英格兰 可基本上

translation.en: even though I was in England.
translation.zh: 我是听美国音乐长大的

translation.en: And through that,
translation.zh: 基于此

translation.en: I guess I realized that an awful lot of American music, blues included,
translation.zh: 我发现包括蓝调在内 特别多的美国音乐

translation.en: relied a lot upon old Celtic melodies,
translation.zh: 都大量依托于 古老的凯尔特旋律

translation.en: Irish, Scottish, English, Welsh, that became part of this country, you know.
translation.zh: 爱尔兰 苏格兰 英国 威尔士都成为美国的一部分

translation.en: So to me, it was translatable easily.
translation.zh: 所以对我而言 转译起来很容易

translation.en: When I first heard Robert Johnson and Lead Belly,
translation.zh: 第一次听罗伯特约翰逊 和莱德贝利的音乐时

translation.en: and I'm hearing an echo...
translation.zh: 我听到一个回音响起…

translation.en: You know, I'm hearing... In my bones, I'm hearing
translation.zh: 我听到… 在我的骨头里 我听到

translation.en: an echo that I shouldn't be hearing
translation.zh: 一个不该被听到的回音响起

translation.en: because it's not within earshot.
translation.zh: 因为它超出了听力范围

translation.en: Which is one of the reasons I wanted to start this thing off with the blues, you know.
translation.zh: 这也是我 从蓝调开始着手的原因之一

translation.en: I mean, I ain't a pop star no more, you know.
translation.zh: 我不再是个流行歌手了

translation.en: I don't wanna be. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我也不想当

translation.en: See, I swore... You know, I thought it was in E, for Christ's sake. I mean, I swore...
translation.zh: 我发誓…我以为是E调的 老天爷 我发誓…

translation.en: I would have gone to the grave saying that I played this in E, man, until today.
translation.zh: 今天以前 本来入土后我该说 我弹的是E调

translation.en: [Richards] My mum was a beautiful music freak with incredible taste.
translation.zh: 我妈妈是个美丽的音乐谜 品味非同一般

translation.en: We only had, like, two radio stations in the whole country, you know.
translation.zh: 整个国家只有两个无线电台

translation.en: And she was a wizard of the dial.
translation.zh: 她是个调台的奇才

translation.en: If there was anything worth listening to, she would find it.
translation.zh: 凡是值得一听的曲子 都逃不过她的掌心

translation.en: Sarah Vaughan and Ella Fitzgerald were her two top thrushes.
translation.zh: 萨拉沃恩和艾拉费兹洁拉 曾是她最迷的两个歌手

translation.en: I liked Billie Holiday. Billie had more edge on it for me.
translation.zh: 我喜欢比利哈乐黛 她的音乐对我来说更锐利

translation.en: But still, that's what I grew up with. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 可就是它伴着我长大的 你明白我的意思吗？

translation.en: Louis Armstrong...
translation.zh: 路易斯阿姆斯特朗…

translation.en: Billy Eckstine...
translation.zh: 比利埃克斯坦…

translation.en: and a little dash of Mozart here and there.
translation.zh: 偶尔会有点莫扎特

translation.en: And then all the usual rubbish.
translation.zh: 都是常见的垃圾

translation.en: Whatever they played on radio. You know, the stuff you couldn't avoid, you know.
translation.zh: 人家在收音机里放什么 你避免不了得听

translation.en: ♪ I'm a pink toothbrush You're a blue toothbrush ♪
translation.zh: 我是粉牙刷 你是蓝牙刷

translation.en: [Richards] All of that crap, you know? I mean, the '50s, which is, all right, great rubbish, in retrospect.
translation.zh: 全是垃圾 回想起来 在50年代 很流行听这些

translation.en: Growing up in England, just after the war,
translation.zh: 我在英格兰长大 战争才过

translation.en: there was rubble everywhere.
translation.zh: 四处是碎石

translation.en: I was not aware that there was any other world apart from bombed out ruins.
translation.zh: 我知道的世界 只有被炸毁的废墟

translation.en: And then, suddenly, Elvis. He hit like a bombshell.
translation.zh: 之后 突然间 埃尔维斯像炸弹一样来袭

translation.en: "Baby Let's Play House" was around then, and it really cooked me.
translation.zh: Baby Let's Play House就是 那时候的曲子 让我兴奋不已

translation.en: The world went from black-and-white to Technicolor.
translation.zh: 世界从黑白变成彩色

translation.en: [Richards] America looked very attractive.
translation.zh: 美国看着非常有吸引力

translation.en: All the movies.
translation.zh: 所有的电影

translation.en: We got what you guys saw, like, a year before.
translation.zh: 你们看到的东西 一年前我们就知道了

translation.en: Especially if you're into music.
translation.zh: 特别是如果你喜欢音乐的话

translation.en: That was basically our lifeline in those days,
translation.zh: 在那段日子里 那基本就是我们的命根子

translation.en: that sense of, there's something happening,
translation.zh: 感觉就是 正在发生一些事

translation.en: and you just wanna be part of it, you know,
translation.zh: 而你只想成为一分子 渴望参与进去

translation.en: and you jumped in with both feet. At least, I did.
translation.zh: 而你只想成为一分子 渴望参与进去 至少 我是这样

translation.en: [Richards] Jim Hall.
translation.zh: 吉姆霍尔

translation.en: [Jordan] We love Jim Hall.
translation.zh: 我们爱吉姆霍尔

translation.en: -Jim, motherfucker. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 吉姆 混账东西

translation.en: [Richards] My grandfather, Gus, he kinda teased me, man, over years, into becoming a guitarist.
translation.zh: 我想当吉他手 这让我祖父格斯逗了我很多年

translation.en: He was one of those guys that always thought
translation.zh: 他跟一些人的想法一样

translation.en: everybody was a musician if they got the chance to be and...
translation.zh: 有机缘的话 人人都能当音乐家

translation.en: So I think he just left the instruments lying about
translation.zh: 所以他就把吉他放在那

translation.en: just to see if it caught the eye.
translation.zh: 看是否会引人注意

translation.en: And then he probably watched me for a couple of years, you know,
translation.zh: 他可能观察了我几年

translation.en: talking to him and looking at the guitar and...
translation.zh: 跟他念叨 看着吉他…

translation.en: 'Cause I remember him saying, "It's a pretty one, isn't it?
translation.zh: 因为我记得他说 “很漂亮吧 不是吗？

translation.en: It's nice, that.
translation.zh: 很漂亮

translation.en: Yeah, when you can reach it...
translation.zh: 等你够得着它…

translation.en: I'll let you play it," you know.
translation.zh: 我就让你弹”

translation.en: Once he did give me the guitar,
translation.zh: 他真把吉他给我的时候

translation.en: he said the best exercise is the Spanish malaguena,
translation.zh: 他说最好的练习曲 是西班牙舞曲

translation.en: because it's got a lot of moves in it that make it great for the fingers.
translation.zh: 因为里面有很多转换 可以让手指头更灵活

translation.en: You're expanding yourself without even knowing.
translation.zh: 在不知情的情况下 充实着自己

translation.en: And he was quite right, because, you know, from learning that...
translation.zh: 他说得很对 因为通过学习那个…

translation.en: 'Cause I had to learn that in order to get the guitar, you know. I mean...
translation.zh: 因为为了拿到吉他 我得学它…

translation.en: That meant I could walk into the house, pick up the guitar and play with it.
translation.zh: 那意味着我可以走到屋里 拿起吉他弹

translation.en: Until then, it would have to be at invitation only.
translation.zh: 那之前 让我弹我才能弹

translation.en: -[man] The story with the guitar... -Oh, it's a...
translation.zh: -吉他的故事… -这是…

translation.en: It's a late '50s Gibson ES-355.
translation.zh: 吉他技师-皮埃尔德博波尔 50年代末的 吉普森ES-355

translation.en: So, kind of a hot rod.
translation.zh: 有点旧改新的感觉在

translation.en: He's always been known for playing a black Gibson.
translation.zh: 他用一把黑色的吉普森 大家众所周知

translation.en: For me, it looks like Keith.
translation.zh: 我觉得它很像基思

translation.en: And as I just showed you, when I opened the case,
translation.zh: 就像刚才给你看的 我一打开盒子

translation.en: he said, "I'll have it." He didn't... Nope. Just... He knew right away.
translation.zh: 他说：“它会是我的” 他没有…他马上就知道了

translation.en: I've been working with Keith now since the '80s.
translation.zh: 从80年代起 我就跟基思在一起工作了

translation.en: I have full access to his guitar lockers and can do what I want.
translation.zh: 我可以随意开他的吉他柜 想做什么都行

translation.en: I do often get to see guitars and bring them to him.
translation.zh: 我常来看看吉他 拿吉他给他

translation.en: This is what Robert Johnson would have played, the model and year.
translation.zh: 这个型号和年份 是罗伯特约翰逊会弹的

translation.en: This is a 1928 L-1 Gibson, you know.
translation.zh: 这是吉普森1928 L-1

translation.en: And the scale length and the flat neck and the width of the nut...
translation.zh: 标尺的长度 平坦的琴颈 弦枕的宽度…

translation.en: It was a style of playing.
translation.zh: 这曾是一种演奏风格

translation.en: So you can do the finger style blues on this.
translation.zh: 你可以在这上面 演绎布鲁斯的演奏指法

translation.en: It almost takes you there. It makes you play that way.
translation.zh: 基本上是靠琴 它决定了演奏的方式

translation.en: The notes last the right amount of time.
translation.zh: 谱子的长度要适量

translation.en: The balance between the high strings
translation.zh: 都要用高级弦

translation.en: and what's going on in the low-end, the snap...
translation.zh: 质量差的结果就是弦会崩…

translation.en: In the locker, unfinished project.
translation.zh: 柜子里还有没完成的计划

translation.en: National Guitar, right here, in my inventory book of Keith's guitars.
translation.zh: 民族吉他 在我这份基思吉他的清单里

translation.en: It says here, "To be rebuilt and then maybe used."
translation.zh: 这写着 “要改造 也许还会用”

translation.en: And I wrote a note, "Kinda reminds me of Jimmy Reed."
translation.zh: 我写了句 “提醒我吉姆雷德”

translation.en: Dig it out, put some strings on it.
translation.zh: 把这个挖了出来 加了几根弦

translation.en: And sometimes I pick up an instrument
translation.zh: 有时候我拿起一个乐器

translation.en: and the sound will take you to a different place.
translation.zh: 声音会带你去个不一样的地方

translation.en: It's like a flavor.
translation.zh: 别有一番风味

translation.en: Steve and Keith walk in. They think we're doing something else.
translation.zh: 史蒂夫和基思走进来 他们以为我们要忙别的

translation.en: We open the case. Keith looks at it, "Oh, great. Hmm."
translation.zh: 我们打开盒子 基思看着它说：“不错”

translation.en: "Check this out, Keith.
translation.zh: “看看这个 基思

translation.en: This has been yours since before I worked for you.
translation.zh: 我跟你工作之前 你就有这把吉他了

translation.en: It's never had strings on it.
translation.zh: 一直没有弦

translation.en: I found it in the locker, I put strings on it."
translation.zh: 我在柜子里找到了它 给它装了弦”

translation.en: Next thing you know, he's out there trying it.
translation.zh: 接着他就弹了弹

translation.en: Steve's like, "Okay, if he's in, I'm in."
translation.zh: 史蒂夫说：“他干 我就干”

translation.en: They start playing, but the control room is set for, you know... for a mix or something.
translation.zh: 他们开始弹琴 控制室 还没有做好录新东西的准备

translation.en: There's no mic set. People aren't ready for this.
translation.zh: 没有装麦克 大家还没准备好

translation.en: "Blues in the Morning," that feeling...
translation.zh: Blues in the Morning 它的感觉…

translation.en: That was just him picking up the guitar.
translation.zh: 就是他拿起吉他

translation.en: There was no second takes, no other tries. It was just where we were going.
translation.zh: 没有第二遍 没有别的尝试 只有我们想要的感觉

translation.en: [Richards] To us, in England,
translation.zh: 对于我们 在英格兰

translation.en: people like Mick and myself and many others...
translation.zh: 像米克和我还有很多其他人… 穆迪沃特斯 查克贝里

translation.en: Chuck arrived... At the time, we were starving for music.
translation.zh: 查克来了… 那时 我们都很渴望音乐

translation.en: The way that man hit us...
translation.zh: 他给我们的冲击…

translation.en: I'm still recovering.
translation.zh: 我现在还没缓过来

translation.en: Incredible lyrics, an incredible devil-may-care attitude.
translation.zh: 难以置信的歌词 难以置信的欢快的姿态

translation.en: He's influenced just about every guitar player, even if they don't know it. You know, I mean...
translation.zh: 他影响了每个吉他手 虽然他们都不知道

translation.en: not a lot of guys wanna play like Chuck because it's like taking on the devil.
translation.zh: 不会有很多人像他那样演奏 因为太难以逾越了

translation.en: I'll take it on, you know. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我要去逾越它

translation.en: Yeah, this is the beginning of the Rolling Stones, you know.
translation.zh: 这是滚石乐队的起点

translation.en: Yeah, and I'm holding a full deck here, pals.
translation.zh: 我手上的 是一张非常精彩的合集

translation.en: That was the one Mick had on the train, you know.
translation.zh: 米克在火车上 拿着的就是这张专辑

translation.en: I got on my morning train to go to art school.
translation.zh: 我在去艺校的早班火车上

translation.en: I happened to hit the carriage that Mick had just gotten into,
translation.zh: 米克刚进一节车厢 我碰巧也进去了

translation.en: and I hadn't seen him in years.
translation.zh: 我很多年没见过他了

translation.en: And then I noticed, tucked under his arm, like this, was...
translation.zh: 然后我发现他胳膊下面夹着…

translation.en: "Oh, yeah. Get out of here.

translation.zh: 我在这演出过一次 和威利纳尔逊一起

translation.zh: 他们都是真汉子

translation.zh: 乡村音乐的发展 就是另一回事了

translation.zh: 从这些人身上 摇滚乐什么好都没捞着

translation.zh: 滚石乐队曾经出现在

translation.zh: 夫勒斯诺市的 假日酒店之类的地方

translation.zh: 屋子里都是油漆味儿

translation.zh: 他们说：“这是你的房间”

translation.zh: “怎么了？” 他们说：“那个

translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什和路德帕金斯 前天晚上之前都住这

translation.zh: 他们把整个屋子 连同窗帘都刷成了橘色”

translation.zh: 要是我早知道的话 我就拿些油漆清洁剂来

translation.zh: 你从来没穿过 华丽的演出服吗？

translation.zh: 我跟你讲

translation.zh: 格拉姆帕森斯 以前总把他的旧衣服给我

translation.zh: 我真有一件很华丽的演出服 是他的

translation.zh: 是圣费尔南多谷 一个叫弩迪的裁缝做的 弩迪

translation.en: We used to go around there, yeah.
translation.zh: 我们以前老去那附近

translation.en: What a madman.
translation.zh: 一个疯子

translation.en: Gram Parsons taught me so much about this mystique of the "country."
translation.zh: 格拉姆帕森斯教了我很多 乡村音乐的要诀

translation.en: I was very much drawn to him, and he was the big influence.
translation.zh: 我被他深深地吸引了 他有很大的影响力

translation.en: [Richards] Gram hung with us when we were cutting Exile On Main Street and "Wild Horses."
translation.zh: 录Exile On Main Street和Wild Horses时 他和我们混在一起

translation.en: Meeting Gram, I got fully immersed in country music.
translation.zh: 遇到格拉姆后 我深深地迷上了乡村音乐

translation.en: But as much as he was a country boy and loved his country music,
translation.zh: 可他越是个乡村男孩 越爱他的乡村音乐

translation.en: his idea of America was very bizarre, you know?
translation.zh: 他的美国理念就越匪夷所思

translation.en: So, I said, "That's bizarre."
translation.zh: 我说：“太匪夷所思了”

translation.zh: 他说：“想看 有多匪夷所思吗？看这”

translation.en: This guy has got longhorns on the end of his Cadillac.
translation.zh: 这家伙把一对长牛角 装在他的卡迪拉克上 弩迪

translation.en: So, to me, all of this temple for a Stetson and some rhinestones is like...
translation.zh: 神殿里的一切都是为了 乡村音乐歌手还有人造钻石

translation.en: But that says the other side of what country music is about.
translation.zh: 也说明了乡村音乐的另一面

translation.en: It's the razzle-dazzle.
translation.zh: 让人眼花缭乱

translation.en: It's Colonel Parker and the dancing chickens.
translation.zh: 就像帕克上校放乡村音乐 让小鸡跳舞

translation.en: Me, I didn't see the Stetson and the rhinestones.
translation.zh: 我没有看 戴着牛仔帽的歌手和宝石

translation.en: I just heard the music.
translation.zh: 我只听音乐

translation.en: And I always knew that this is the heartland.
translation.zh: 我一直知道这是中心地带

translation.en: This is where American music was put in the crucible
translation.zh: 在这 美国音乐被千锤百炼

translation.en: and came out as, you know, pretty much pure silver.
translation.zh: 最后百炼成纯银

translation.en: This was rock and roll.
translation.zh: 这是摇滚乐

translation.en: That's where country music and the blues sort of collided.
translation.zh: 是乡村音乐和蓝调 发生了某种碰撞的产物

translation.en: I always felt myself fortunate to be in a spot where, in America,
translation.zh: 我一直觉得自己很幸运 在美国赶上了好时候

translation.en: these few forms of music were somehow merging and creating something else, you know?
translation.zh: 那时这几种类型的音乐 莫名地融合 产生了新的东西

translation.en: So, it was great to watch and be a part of, and now be the king of.
translation.zh: 能亲眼目睹还参与其中 真好 现在还是摇滚乐之王

translation.en: That was it. Yeah, all right.
translation.zh: 就是这样 还成

translation.en: Mind you, I don't go around searching for songs, you know, with a butterfly net.
translation.zh: 听着 我没有蓄意去四处找歌

translation.en: Because I think, basically, songs have to come to you.
translation.zh: 因为我觉得 基本上歌得来找你

translation.en: You know, going around, like, trying to winkle them out with a sharp stick,
translation.zh: 拿根尖头的棍子 在周围走走 费劲把它们找出来

translation.en: going, "Come here, you little son-of-a-bitch."
translation.zh: “过来 你个小婊砸”

translation.zh: 在房子的走廊漫步时 我写了首歌 有几分乡村乐

translation.en: And it's not often, my old lady suddenly came out of the bedroom,
translation.zh: 很难得 我老婆 突然从卧室出来

translation.en: and looked over and said, "That's a good song."
translation.zh: 审视了下 说：“曲子不错”

translation.en: Hey, if the wife says so...
translation.zh: 如果老婆这么说了…

translation.en: It was very Hank Williams.
translation.zh: 很有汉克威廉姆斯的感觉

translation.zh: 然后我想：“不对 是太汉克威廉姆斯了

translation.en: Let's give it a kick. Let's push it up."
translation.zh: 要加快速度 往前推”

translation.en: And I loved working with the drummer. It's a one-on-one thing.
translation.zh: 我喜欢和鼓手 一对一的一起工作

translation.en: And it's an amazingly uncomplicated way to deal with...
translation.zh: 相当简单的方法来对付…

translation.zh: 特别是玩摇滚的时候

translation.en: And the other thing, too, I mean, just as a fan...
translation.zh: 另外一件事 单作为粉丝来说

translation.zh: 我喜欢他弹贝斯的方式

translation.zh: 能让基斯尽可能多地演奏乐器

translation.zh: 对我来说特别激动

translation.en: Because those are some of my favorite Stones records,
translation.zh: 因为他弹贝斯和吉他的时候

translation.zh: 弹的都是 我特别喜欢的滚石的曲子

translation.zh: 我那时候演过几首贝斯的曲子 我真的很喜欢贝斯

translation.en: I'm probably a better bass player than I am guitar, actually. [laughs]
translation.zh: 也许我当贝斯手比当吉他手好

translation.en: -[man] Look at you! -I love this shit. I love this shit.
translation.zh: -瞅瞅你！ -我爱这玩意

translation.zh: 曾经史蒂夫乔丹跟我说

translation.zh: “嘿 兄弟”你知道他那很甜 害羞 谦逊的样子…

translation.zh: 他说：“你是怎么录的 Jumpin' Jack Flash？

translation.zh: 怎么录的 Street Fighting Man？”

translation.zh: 那段日子 你会说 大致上 你那几点…

translation.zh: “工作室那几点了？”

translation.zh: 你可以说晚上八九点 而乐队会在午夜露面

translation.zh: 有时候我会故意早点到

translation.zh: 如果我和查理在一起 我可能会说：“早点走吧…”

translation.zh: 然后我就去检验我的一些想法

translation.en: But now and again, you'd actually find out this is the track.
translation.zh: 可你现在再看 你会发现这是那首曲子

translation.zh: 一 二 一 二 三 四

translation.zh: Street Fighting Man是第一首 在那样的环境下产生的曲子

translation.zh: 查理和我那时就是在即兴发挥

translation.zh: 听起来就像 几个人在街头卖唱一样

translation.zh: 查理打着这个小的 旅行用的架子鼓

translation.zh: 我弹的是原声吉他

translation.zh: “我们就从这个开始”

translation.zh: 那首曲子里没有电吉他

translation.en: It's all overloaded acoustics.
translation.zh: 都是些电音的原声

translation.zh: 我发现我能拿卡带机当拾音器

translation.en: And I play an acoustic guitar through it and, like, slam it through so loud
translation.zh: 我通过它弹原声吉他 弹得很大声

translation.en: that it was totally overloaded.
translation.zh: 就完全是电音的效果了

translation.zh: 找到了1967年的力科 和你以前带在身边的是同一款

translation.en: Again. Play.
translation.zh: 重弹一次

translation.zh: 就这么多了 看看放出来的效果

translation.zh: 然后在录音机前面放个麦克风 放到工作室里

translation.zh: 这基本上就有了电吉他的声音 可是有原声吉他的感觉

translation.en: [Richards on tape] That's as much as you're gonna get.
translation.zh: 就这么多了

translation.zh: 基本就是从这着手 米克会把它完成

translation.en: [Richards] We were working so hard in those days that you couldn't write 'em fast enough.
translation.zh: 那段时间我们很卖力 写的速度都跟不上

translation.zh: 我把贝斯放下 就拿起吉他

translation.zh: 曲子用了两个小时就完成了

translation.zh: 可有时候 总有意外

translation.zh: 你在录音 一切都筹谋好了

translation.zh: 那首曲子在录了这么多遍后

translation.zh: 从有点迪伦感觉的民谣

translation.zh: 变成了用一把原声吉他 弹出挽歌的感觉

translation.zh: “这首曲子可以再更多汁些”

translation.en: And, slowly, it built up...
translation.zh: 慢慢就成形了…

translation.zh: 那首曲子中我弹了贝斯 和查理一起

translation.en: and we brought it up to a sort of samba thing.
translation.zh: 我们弹出了桑巴的感觉

translation.en: And then suddenly, everybody looked,
translation.zh: 大家突然都看我们

translation.en: and he said, "Yeah. Yeah, all right, okay."
translation.zh: 他说：“好吧 没事”

translation.en: You never know quite when the magic bit's gonna come in.
translation.zh: 魔法什么时候降临 你永远不清楚

translation.en: [Waits] Every song has at least ten songs inside of it
translation.zh: 每首歌曲里 至少包含了十首歌曲

translation.en: that can be released from the song and you can make, you know...
translation.zh: 这些歌曲可以被择出来 你可以做…

translation.zh: 在一个屋里同时放两首歌的话 它们会产生一些新的东西

translation.zh: 如果你想开始尝试写歌 你必须学会像作曲家一样思考

translation.en: You're trying to break into the ritual of music.
translation.zh: 做音乐的惯例是如此 你得上道

translation.zh: 这跟魔术师胡迪尼截然相反

translation.zh: 不是在尝试逃出去 而是在尝试被放进来

translation.zh: 我妻子问我：“你喜欢谁？”

translation.en: Of all of the people I have ever met, Muddy Waters, he was a father to me.
translation.zh: 我遇到的人中 穆迪沃特斯 是可以称为父亲的人

translation.en: [man] Yeah, that's right! [Waters] What about Keith?
translation.zh: -就这样！ -那基思怎么样？

translation.en: [Richards] He took me under his wing.
translation.zh: 他一直照顾我

translation.en: It was just amazing to finally play together.
translation.zh: 我们最终能一起演出 是非常神奇的

translation.en: Was I honored by that? Man, I had died and gone to heaven.
translation.zh: 我感到非常自豪吗？ 哥们 我已经自豪得上天堂了

translation.en: For the first time ever...
translation.zh: 有史以来第一次…

translation.en: A Stones' show, "What are you gonna wear?"
translation.zh: 在滚石的演出上 “我们该穿什么？”

translation.en: "We don't give a shit," you know what I mean?
translation.zh: “我们才不管呢” 你懂吧？

translation.en: For the Checkerboard show, Ronnie and I were like, "What are we gonna wear, man?"
translation.zh: 但在棋盘的演出 罗尼和我 却在问：“我们该穿什么？”

translation.en: "White shirts, black vests." You know? [laughs]
translation.zh: “白衬衫 黑背心”

translation.en: We actually talked about what we were gonna wear before we go on.
translation.zh: 事实上还讨论了 我们演出前该穿什么

translation.en: This is the only time, ever, I can remember doing that.
translation.zh: 在我的记忆中 这情形史无前例

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 哦 哥们

translation.en: [Richards] Muddy's house.
translation.zh: 穆迪的家

translation.en: Wow. You would've thought Chicago could do something more for the man, you know?
translation.zh: 你可能会想 芝加哥总能让人成大事

translation.en: It was a lot more vibrant the last time I was here.
translation.zh: 我上次来这儿的时候 要精力充沛得多

translation.en: It was a party. I mean, it was night time.
translation.zh: 那是一个晚上的聚会

translation.en: I think Willie Dixon brought me over.
translation.zh: 我记得是威力迪克逊带我去的

translation.en: It was rocking when I got here, I remember that.
translation.zh: 我记得我到的那会儿 他们正在摇滚

translation.en: It's leaving I don't remember.
translation.zh: 忘了我怎么离开那儿的

translation.en: I crashed out here. But I woke up in Howlin' Wolf's house.
translation.zh: 我玩疯了 醒来的时候 在嚎叫野狼的家里

translation.en: I don't know what happened. I got carried away.
translation.zh: 我不知道发生了什么 我太激动了

translation.en: The party continued, and I went with it.
translation.zh: 聚会经常办 我也一直参加

translation.en: [Waters] Get Mickey a towel, will ya?
translation.zh: 能给米奇拿条毛巾吗？

translation.en: Thank you very much, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 非常感谢大家

translation.en: We'll keep the show moving.
translation.zh: 我们将会继续演出

translation.en: Mr. Muddy Waters! Give it to him! Give it to Mr. Muddy Waters.
translation.zh: 穆迪沃特斯先生！ 把话筒给他！

translation.en: [man] You know, Muddy was younger then than you are now.
translation.zh: 穆迪那时比现在的你还年轻

translation.en: I mean, it seems like you, when you were young,
translation.zh: 就像年轻时的你一样

translation.en: kind of wanted to be one of those guys.
translation.zh: 很想成为他们中的一员

translation.en: And now, in a way, you kind of are one of those guys.
translation.zh: 而你现在已经是 他们中的一员了

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 对 我知道

translation.en: Life's a funny thing, you know.
translation.zh: 人生很有意思

translation.en: And nobody wants to get old,
translation.zh: 没有人会想老去

translation.en: but they don't wanna die young either.
translation.zh: 但谁也不想年轻的时候就死去

translation.en: You know, and you just gotta follow this thing down the path, you know.
translation.zh: 你只能沿着这条路一直向前

translation.en: After I left home, my dad and my mother split up.
translation.zh: 我离开家之后 父母就离婚了

translation.en: And then I lost touch with my dad for 20 years.
translation.zh: 随后有20年时间 我没能联系上我父亲

translation.en: Maybe, 'cause I was thinking about, "God, what he must've thought of me?"
translation.zh: 也许因为那时候我一直想 “上帝 他一定在想我吧？”

translation.en: I mean, he was a straight-up guy. I mean, a hardworking man and all that.
translation.zh: 他是个直爽的人 工作很努力

translation.en: You know, I mean, the idea of his son being busted for drugs.
translation.zh: 当他知道他的儿子 沉迷于毒品的时候

translation.en: I could think of him saying...
translation.zh: 我能想象出他会说

translation.en: "Well, he'd never come to any good."
translation.zh: “他从来就不干什么好事”

translation.en: After about 20 years, I wrote him a note and got one back.
translation.zh: 大约20年以后 我给他写了封信 他也回信了

translation.en: And we set up a meeting at my house in England.
translation.zh: 于是我们约定 在我英格兰的家中会面

translation.en: I took Ronnie Wood with me for protection. That's how scared I was.
translation.zh: 我带着罗尼伍德 以防万一 我就是那么害怕

translation.en: The door opens and out comes out this little old guy.
translation.zh: 门开了 进来一个小老头

translation.en: You know, his legs have gone a bit and he's like...
translation.zh: 他的脚有点不好使了 就像…

translation.en: But it was Dad, you know, and it was...
translation.zh: 但他就是我父亲 那…

translation.en: It was so easy. Within a few minutes, we sorted it all well out.
translation.zh: 那太轻松了 我们在几分钟后就相处融洽了

translation.en: And he became, for the next 20 years, my best mate.
translation.zh: 而在之后的20年里 他成了我最好的伙伴

translation.en: For another 20 years,
translation.zh: 在这个20年里

translation.en: he came on every trip, every show, come around the world with me.
translation.zh: 他跟随我去世界各地的 每一次旅行 每一场演出

translation.en: And I loved to show him the world.
translation.zh: 我也很乐意带他去看世界

translation.en: And he didn't mind seeing it either.
translation.zh: 他也很乐意去看

translation.en: Poor old boy. He's older than I am.
translation.zh: 可怜的老男孩 他可比我老

translation.en: Right, babe?
translation.zh: 对吧 亲爱的？

translation.en: My family, they're incredibly important, you know.
translation.zh: 我的家庭 对我来说太重要了

translation.en: When you see offspring of offspring, then something else hits home.
translation.zh: 每当你看见孙子的时候 你会觉得家有了另一种感觉

translation.en: I mean, it's one thing having a kid.
translation.zh: 有了孩子是一种感觉

translation.en: But when you get the grandsons and the granddaughters,
translation.zh: 而有了孙子和孙女的时候

translation.en: well, that is... that's an amazing feeling.
translation.zh: 好吧 那是一种… 一种神奇的感觉

translation.en: I don't know of what. Accomplishment? I don't know. Or continuity?
translation.zh: 我无法形容那感觉 成就感？ 我不知道 或者是延续感？

translation.en: But basically, love.
translation.zh: 但归根结底 那是爱

translation.en: [Richards] I've been blessed, man.
translation.zh: 我一定是被保佑的 哥们

translation.en: I'll play as long as I can get away with it.
translation.zh: 只要我可以 我会一直演出下去

translation.en: And that's all I can do.
translation.zh: 那是我所能做的一切

translation.en: I'm not getting old. I'm evolving.
translation.zh: 我没有变老 我是在升华

translation.en: [man 1] Right on.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: -Right on. -[man 2] That was a fine piece of work.
translation.zh: -好极了 -那真是首好歌

translation.en: [Richards] Once again, Larry, great to see you, man.
translation.zh: 拉里 很高兴见到你

translation.en: [man 3] All right. [man 4] Oh, yeah. I like this stuff.
translation.zh: -好 -我喜欢这东西

translation.en: [man 5] Yeah, balls to the walls, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 好嘞 全力以赴 伙计们
